text:
#COVID19 #Vaccine Update. Beginning Tuesday, April 13, extended-hour appointments will be available at the Las #Vegas Convention Center site between 4pm and 7:30pm.

Appointments are also available today. Register now at https://t.co/Z8jTkBmDsR and #TakeYourShot. Get #Vaccinated. https://t.co/n0v7FLs4TW
